links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: If n is odd, then all three factors are mutually coprime, so lcm = (3n+1)(3n+2)(3n+3), else one half that expression. - _Christopher Carl Heckman_, Sep 29 2004Empirical g.f.: 6*(10*x^6+28*x^5+125*x^4+70*x^3+80*x^2+10*x+1) / ((x-1)^4*(x+1)^4). - _Colin Barker_, Feb 25 2013
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 12 2001
